text: Mele agbagba dzem be maxe mɔzɔgbalẽfea gake fexexea yi edzi le kpo dom nu le agbo la dzi. Esia dze egɔme tso ŋdi sia me.
Bere biara a mɛkliki akatua so no, kratafa no yɛ nwini anaasɛ ɛkyerɛ mfomso bi na asɛm no nkɔ mu. Mede intanɛt nkitahodi a ɛyɛ den na ɛreyɛ eyi afi Accra hɔ.
The system is not allowing me to complete my payment for the application. I also cleared my cache and still faced the same problem.

Merebɔ mmɔden sɛ mɛtua akwantu tumi krataa ho ka nanso sika a wotua no kɔ so di nkogu wɔ portal no so. Na mfomso ho mmara biara nni hɔ a emu da hɔ, mfomso ho nkrasɛm a wɔde di dwuma wɔ ɔkwan a ɛkɔ akyiri so ara kwa.
